basics.name: Matin Moqadas
basics.label: Master’s Student in Artificial Intelligence
basics.summary: I am a Master’s student in Artificial Intelligence specializing in NLP and LLM research with hands-on experience in AI engineering and patent analysis. Proficient in Python, Hugging Face Transformers, LangChain, with a growing interest in Retrieval‑Augmented Generation (RAG). Actively seeking collaborative research and assistantship roles bridging academia and industry.

work.name: Entekhab Group
work.summary: Conducting AI‑related research and analysis as part of patent review process, while contributing to NLP and LLM based solution development.

volunteer.summary: Assisted in delivering lectures, clarifying complex algorithmic concepts and guiding students through problem‑solving techniques. Collaborated with professors to enhance course materials and student engagement.

Freelance high‑school mathematics teacher. Created engaging lessons in geometry, algebra, and introductory calculus. Organized group problem‑solving sessions and fostered a positive, collaborative learning environment.
highlights: Created interactive teaching methods and group math games
Improved student understanding through simplified explanations

volunteer.summary: Participated in a Machine Learning study group based on 'Hands‑On Machine Learning' book, covering fundamentals through six chapters. Organized a community event to encourage peers in data science and machine learning.
highlights: Organized community ML workshops and discussions

projects.name: LLM‑based NLP Applications
projects.summary: Developing chatbots and text summarization systems using Hugging Face Transformers and LangChain, with RAG pipelines in production‑like settings.
